guidelines: Uses proper ARIA attributes including role='group' and aria-roledescription='slide'
Includes data-slider-slide attribute for JavaScript identification
Provides meaningful alt text for images
Ensures sufficient color contrast across themes
Supports screen reader navigation within slider context
wcag_compliance: WCAG 2.1 AA - 1.3.1 Info and Relationships (semantic structure)
accessibility.aria_support: Slide role with descriptive attributes for carousel context

best_practices: Keep slide content concise and scannable
Use high-quality, relevant images with descriptive alt text
Limit number of action links to avoid cognitive overload
Ensure primary action is clearly differentiated (first link becomes primary button)
Test with both theme variations for consistent appearance
Consider image position in relation to content flow
Use semantic date formats for accessibility
technical_notes: Designed specifically for use within slider component
First link automatically becomes primary button style
Image position affects column ordering and offset classes
Date display varies based on whether end date is provided
Responsive layout changes significantly between mobile and desktop

notes: Component has stable status in source
Complex responsive layout with flexible content areas
Comprehensive prop structure for various content types
